files.Title: Solstice.API.Attributes.DeleteAttribute
files.Summary: DeleteAttribute is a class that extends the HttpDeleteAttribute class in the Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc package. It allows customization of the DELETE HTTP verb attribute in a Controller action method signature.

files.Title: Solstice.API.Attributes.GetAttribute
files.Summary: GetAttribute class inherits from the HttpGetAttribute class in Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc. It works as a HTTP GET method attribute with optional route template. This class has two constructors. The default constructor creates a new GetAttribute with no parameters. The second one accepts a string parameter that represents a route template.

files.Title: Solstice.API.Attributes.HeadAttribute
files.Summary: Represents an attribute that specifies that an action supports the HTTP HEAD method.

files.Title: Solstice.API.Attributes.PatchAttribute
files.Summary: The PatchAttribute class represents a custom attribute to indicate that an action method should handle HTTP PATCH requests. It has been derived from the HttpPatchAttribute class provided by the ASP.NET Core MVC framework.

files.Title: Solstice.API.Attributes.PostAttribute
files.Summary: The 'PostAttribute' class is a decorator extending from the 'HttpPostAttribute' class in the Microsoft ASP.NET Core MVC framework. It is used to specify the HTTP POST request methods for the action methods in the controller class.

files.Title: Solstice.API.Attributes.PutAttribute
files.Summary: The PutAttribute class inherits from the HttpPutAttribute class and represents an attribute that is used to indicate the HTTP PUT method for an action within a controller.

files.Title: Solstice.API.Controllers.CoreController
files.Summary: The CoreController is responsible for controlling the behavior of the system when it has to Solstice. This includes authorizing the user who is asking for the system restart, and providing the necessary Solstice API endpoint.

files.Title: Solstice.API.Injections.CoreInjections
files.Summary: The CoreInjections class is a static class containing methods related to core service injections in an ASP.NET Core application.

files.Title: Solstice.Domain.Exceptions.CoreException
files.Summary: Represents an exception that is thrown when there is an error.

files.Title: Solstice.Domain.Exceptions.CoreExceptionEnum
files.Summary: Represents the possible exceptions that can be thrown by the Solstice.Domain classes.

files.Title: Solstice.Domain.Exceptions.CoreExceptionEnumExtension
files.Summary: Provides extension methods for the enumeration.

files.Title: Solstice.Domain.Models.CoreModel
files.Summary: CoreModel class provides a structure to encapsulate information related to Solstice functionality in the application. The information mainly includes id associated to each Solstice transaction or operation.

files.Title: Solstice.Domain.Models.Page
files.Summary: Represents a page in a Solstice context with a specific page number and size.

files.Title: Solstice.Domain.Models.PageExtension
files.Summary: Provides extension methods on a instance.

files.Title: Solstice.Domain.Models.Paged<T>
files.Summary: The 'Paged' class provides a simple way to encapsulate a collection of items with a certain count. It's generic, able to support any type of object (indicated by 'T') for pagination purposes.

files.Title: Solstice.Infrastructure.Attributes.QueryAttribute
files.Summary: Represents a custom attribute. This attribute is used to indicate which classes are to be used for database queries. It is a sealed class derived from the Attribute class, hence no other class can inherit from it.

files.Title: Solstice.Infrastructure.Attributes.RepositoryAttribute
files.Summary: The 'RepositoryAttribute' class, derived from 'Attribute', is a custom attribute class. It may be used to annotate repository classes. This class is 'sealed' which prevents further derivation.

files.Title: Solstice.Infrastructure.Core.CoreRepository<T, TContext>
files.Summary: An abstract class for the CoreRepository. Constructs a repository with a given context and Http context.

files.Title: Solstice.Infrastructure.Core.ICoreRepository<T>
files.Summary: The ICoreRepository interface provides methods for performing CRUD operations, querying, counting, paging, transactions, and other tasks on an underlying data repository in an asynchronous manner. The repository holds objects of a type. The methods in this interface produce or consume tasks that represent ongoing work and are used for structuring asynchronous code.

files.Title: Solstice.Infrastructure.Extensions.CoreQueryableExtension
files.Summary: Represents a utility class that provides extension methods to IQueryable interface objects.

files.Title: Solstice.Infrastructure.Injections.RepositoryInjections
files.Summary: The RepositoryInjections static class contains extension methods for ModelBuilder and IServiceCollection instances. These extension methods add convenient functionality for database and service-related configurations.

files.Title: Solstice.Infrastructure.Specifications.Specification<T>
files.Summary: The coreSpecifications<T> class implements the ICoreSpecifications<T> interface for providing generic ways to define specifications for querying the database.

files.Title: Solstice.Repository.Attributes.QueryAttribute
files.Summary: Represents a custom attribute. This attribute is used to indicate which classes are to be used for database queries. It is a sealed class derived from the Attribute class, hence no other class can inherit from it.

files.Title: Solstice.Repository.Attributes.RepositoryAttribute
files.Summary: The 'RepositoryAttribute' class, derived from 'Attribute', is a custom attribute class. It may be used to annotate repository classes. This class is 'sealed' which prevents further derivation.

files.Title: Solstice.Repository.Core.CoreRepository<T, TContext>
files.Summary: An abstract class for the CoreRepository. Constructs a repository with a given context and Http context.

files.Title: Solstice.Repository.Core.ICoreRepository<T>
files.Summary: The ICoreRepository interface provides methods for performing CRUD operations, querying, counting, paging, transactions, and other tasks on an underlying data repository in an asynchronous manner. The repository holds objects of a type. The methods in this interface produce or consume tasks that represent ongoing work and are used for structuring asynchronous code.

files.Title: Solstice.Repository.Extensions.CoreQueryableExtension
files.Summary: Represents a utility class that provides extension methods to IQueryable interface objects.

files.Title: Solstice.Repository.Injections.RepositoryInjections
files.Summary: The RepositoryInjections static class contains extension methods for ModelBuilder and IServiceCollection instances. These extension methods add convenient functionality for database and service-related configurations.

files.Title: Solstice.Repository.Specifications.Specification<T>
files.Summary: The coreSpecifications<T> class implements the IcoreSpecifications<T> interface for providing generic ways to define specifications for querying the database.

files.Title: Solstice.Applications.Attributes.ServiceAttribute
files.Summary: The ServiceAttribute is a custom attribute used for marking classes within the Solstice.Service namespace. This attribute is sealed, implying that it cannot be inherited from.

files.Title: Solstice.Applications.Attributes.ServiceInterfaceAttribute
files.Summary: The ServiceInterfaceAttribute is a custom attribute used for marking interface within the Solstice.Service namespace. This attribute is sealed, implying that it cannot be inherited from.

files.Title: Solstice.Applications.Core.CoreService<TRepository, T>
files.Summary: Abstract class 'CoreService' defines the operations for managing entities of type T in the database.

files.Title: Solstice.Applications.Core.ICoreService<T>
files.Summary: This interface describes an abstraction for a data manipulation service on a given type of CoreModel. It includes methods for CRUD operations, queries for specific entities, counting entities, starting transactions, and more.

files.Title: Solstice.Applications.Injections.ServiceInjections
files.Summary: A static helper class for service injections.

files.Title: Solstice.Service.Attributes.ServiceAttribute
files.Summary: The ServiceAttribute is a custom attribute used for marking classes within the Solstice.Service namespace. This attribute is sealed, implying that it cannot be inherited from.

files.Title: Solstice.Service.Base.CoreService<TRepository, T>
files.Summary: Abstract class 'CoreService' defines the operations for managing entities of type T in the database.

files.Title: Solstice.Service.Base.ICoreService<T>
files.Summary: This interface describes an abstraction for a data manipulation service on a given type of RadiantModel. It includes methods for CRUD operations, queries for specific entities, counting entities, starting transactions, and more.

files.Title: Solstice.Service.Injections.ServiceInjections
files.Summary: A static helper class for service injections.
